sentences.sContent: He spoke reverently about colleges and loved walking around the Stanford campus.
sentences.sContent_eng: He spoke reverently about colleges and loved walking around the Stanford campus.
sentences.sCn: 他虔诚地谈到大学，说自己喜欢在斯坦佛校园漫步。

sentences.sContent: As the store clerk reverently lifted the object out of the case, I knew it would be too small.
sentences.sContent_eng: As the store clerk reverently lifted the object out of the case, I knew it would be too small.
sentences.sCn: 当店员恭敬地从柜台里取出这个物品时，我知道它肯定太小了。

sentences.sContent: There, many thousands of years ago, a nameless people reverently buried their loved ones.
sentences.sContent_eng: There, many thousands of years ago, a nameless people reverently buried their loved ones.
sentences.sCn: 就在数千年前的此地，一群无名无姓的人虔诚地埋葬了他们所深爱的人。

words.tran: 虔诚的；表示尊敬的；可尊敬的
